title: Special backlog registration doubts
content:
Hi so I have backlog in all my subjects in first sem 
(don't give me shit about it I know I fucked up, but I don't care as bad)
So I've been asking about backlog for and my teachers haven't replied to my texts so I'm asking here 
Say i have backlog in first sem esa, do I have to fill the backlog registration form and payment, first sem before deadline or when I have appear for it  in 2 or 3rd sem.
(Non engineer ofc)

comments.body: You can take it in any semester, just pay the dues in the backlog registrations tab. Its 250 for each credit and you're allowed to take a minimum of 24 credits each sem.
Summer term backlogs are also a thing.
moving from 3rd sem to 4th i have 9 credtis backlog in this sem and 15 from 2nd sem, will i get an year back or can i clear all these in the summer term?

The summer term is ideal...you get to study whole heartedly without insem subjects to deal with. Like I said you can apply for 24 credits minimum so 6 subjects you can apply to in summer. Perhaps have to sacrifice summer term internships if you were planning on applying. Your call.
